All I wanted was to have this fixed.  I would recommend only buying products sold by Amazon.  The customer service they give is eccellent.  I now watch who is selling the product.  I will never buy from bestinternational agian.

Reviews.Title: People claim reviews are fake which scared me, but I've given the time after receiving the product and have no complaints!
Reviews.Author: B. Mortinson
Reviews.Content: I ordered quickly after seeing high reviews. There was a delay with it being sent, and after closer overlook of reviews I found some pretty bad ones. I was fearful, so I took a couple weeks to be sure all was well. The product arrived within the time allotted. Weve had no problems with a power button, or battery problem, charging, nothing. It is a great product! Especially for the price!!!! Thanks!***UPDATE almost 6 mo later** A couple months ago the product stopped charging. Ive seen others on here also complaining of problems with the charging port but figured Id figure something out or it was cheap enough to just buy my daughter a higher quality tablet in the future. What I believe to be the problem it on the charger the metal piece is wobbly. Its loose and it makes sense because ive read of others piece getting stuck within the port. Ours hasnt. I hope to get some sort of response or help because were trying to find a charger for it and I have no idea what to do. I understand this product is low cost and it is a quality product for the price but if the chargers arent working and keep being loose we cant use the product. *****

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0

Reviews.Content: I love it and also my granddaughter.  It was a replacement for a Christmas gift which was dropped and destroyed.  She love it.  Will order another.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Randy Countryman
Reviews.Content: I love the color of it. It was a gift for my daughters birthday. She enjoys it. It's kind of slow, but does what she wants.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy

Reviews.Content: Great price, really gets a lot of use.  Easy to use no problems.  Will probably order another one for my 8 yr old.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Cati Holker
Reviews.Content: Wow, I wish I would have taken the bad reviews on this product more seriously.It took a LONG time for the product to come.  Shipment tracking was poor and non-specific.When I finally received the tablet, I was relieved (I was beginning to think I had been ripped off), and overall, I was happy with the tablet.Not ONE MONTH later, the power button became depressed/lodged and now my tablet is rendered useless. The tablet charges and the screen is active, but I cannot turn it on.  I contacted the company and have received no answer.This company is based in China, so correspondence can be difficult due to the language barrier.  This isn't a deal-breaker on it's own for me, in addition to everything else, it's just a tad bit frustrating.$80 wasted.

Reviews.Title: not bad

Reviews.Title: no so bad

Reviews.Content: sometimes it freezes, and the scrren does not work, you press and press and stay like nohing happens, i purchased it for a little girl,,,,  so she is not going to use it that often... so, it is ok for her

Reviews.Title: Mine came defective/damaged can't get through to amazon cs.
Reviews.Author: yeahaboutthat
Reviews.Content: The 2 stars is for this product's performance, not amazon's poor customer service of course. (Just wanted to say that before anyone jumps down my throat) Bought for my mom, who has cancer and lives with me. I handled it mostly to help her set it up and we noticed problems right off the bat. We weren't expecting anything fancy, but to work and be able to get some use out of it would have been appropriate for the price paid I think. We charged it to full first thing, set it up a little bit, turned it off with the charge at 74 percent and turned it back on 30 minutes later to discover the battery had completely drained. To our disappointment, it does that every time. The touch screen is unresponsive at times especially in certain areas, you have to press really hard and sometimes even then it does not respond. There are specks in the back of the lcd screen, enough to be bothersome when using. My mom is too polite to want to return it when I mentioned it she said no, she already threw out the box it came in anyways and said it'll be alright and she feels bad. At first it was extremely slow to charge, taking hours to just get even halfway, and sometimes after it has been charged all the way and she disconnects the charger the full charge goes right back down to only a barely charged within seconds without doing anything. I have been trying to contact amazon's customer service, I remember years ago they had the best customer service if ever there was a problem, now I can't even get ahold of them. I don't have a phone with minutes right now but have been trying to submit their online forms and have been getting a "We're sorry. There was an error trying to send your e-mail. Please try again in a few minutes or contact us by phone." Message. I have been trying several times a day everyday, it doesn't look like they are fixing the form problem. I have scoured the internet for their customer service address but it seems like all of them have been disabled. Extremely disappointed with this product and with amazon's customer service, they lost a long time customer. Again, rating I gave strictly for product performance only, just had to throw in my problems with customer service in this experience to maybe save someone else the trouble.

Reviews.Title: This product is pretty awesome
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I love that the pc devices are becoming so small and we still can do so much with them. Looking forward to seeing what technology will come up with next.

Reviews.Title: its okay

Reviews.Title: Does the job nicely.

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter.  Seems to work well and is cheaper than an ipod touch.There are plenty of apps and it seems to work well, other than the battery life is about 3-4 hours.It's screen is lower resolution than the iphone 5 or ipad 3,  but it's perfectly fine for her usage.  I don't want her on the internet or doing e-mail or facebook yet!*** Update,  after not using the device for a week and attempting to boot the device,  it never got past the post screen.  I even tried entering Android diagnostic mode and couldn't get it going.  So I've returned it to the manufacturer for a refund.  I guess you get what you pay for and the fact that nexus 7 and galaxy tab 2's are only $50 more these days,  I was taught a lesson in not skimping on the kids ;-)

Reviews.Title: Great product for kids
Reviews.Author: Happy customer
Reviews.Content: The zeepad tablet works great, my kids love it, they enjoy playing angry birds and other preloaded games.I can check my email, facebook and use skype to talk to my mom. It really works great.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Tubbs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 11yr son who loves "screens", and as a trial for owning this type of electronic. If he took care of this, we would move up to something like an iPad.  I decided to play with it first and perhaps add a few apps and music.  All went well until I got hooked on playing Angry Bird.  During my many nights of playing Angry Bird, the screen began to freeze.  I had to hit the power button once to turn it off (but not shut down) and then back on again in order to continue my game.  I certainly decided to NOT buy this for myself, but he seemed to enjoy it and worked around that problem.  He even watched Netflix movies and YouTube videos on it.  I'm not sure it he still had problems with it freezing.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Sherell Hill
Reviews.Content: Very great buy! I had an issue with it and sent it back to the manufacturer. They sent a new one back and its been awesome since then. I recommend it!

Reviews.Content: it works but is a bit slow .....roku is a better buy thans this,UNLESS you want it to be portable

Reviews.Title: Happy with this product!

Reviews.Content: Received this tablet on time. It is responsive and easy to use. I would recommend it if you are seeking an inexpensive tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Pamala W. Gambrell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my tech savvy 3 year old nephew. He LOVE it! When he has this Zeepad in his hands, he doesn't tear up the house.

Reviews.Title: worst tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Jmerc
Reviews.Content: I don't get the persons who gave these tablets high reviews because they stink.  I understand for the money you get what you pay for but man these turned out bad.  First off the power supply broke all on it's own then the port became loose and you had to hold the cord on a angle for it charge. The screens scratched easily and one even cracked. They would freeze up and you had to reset it and the battery didn't last long at all. My cell phone worked better than this product. So save yourself the trouble and don't waste both your time and money! Your better off spending some money and getting  a good brand tablet. As always "you get what you pay for!"

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dina J Green
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a xmas gift for my grandson and according to my daughter it is awesome! Its even better than the one she at a different story and different maker for my oldest granddaughter. Now my granddaughter wants the same exact one!

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Becky Porter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item as a gift for my kids thinking it would be a great starter tablet.  Once we received the item, I was very happy with how easy it was to start using and the speed of the apps, specifically Netflix, as my kids watch their favorite shows on it.  And then it went downhill.  I had this product LESS THAN ONE WEEK when it completely stopped working. We used it to watch a movie on Netflix one evening.  I turned it off after using it and we went to bed.  The next afternoon, I attempted to turn it on so we could watch a movie since it was raining.  And nothing.  Would not turn on. I tried charging the tablet and nothing worked.  Needless to say, I was less than pleased.  What pushed me over the dissatisfaction edge is that when returning this item, I had to pay for return shipping; that shipping (since it is international) costs me $26.  So not only am I currently out the money I spent on the item, I am now out an extra $26 because I was sent a defective product.  I can understand if I wanted to return this product for my own simple reason paying the shipping. But when this product was defective and lasted less than one week after I received it, making me pay the return shipping is not the way to keep me as a customer.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the money.
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Have an ongoing problem with using the charger.  Have to wiggle the plug around to get it to charge.  Other than that, the tablet is a pretty good item.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with Angry Birds, Fruit Ninja, and a few other games pre-loaded which was nice. I was also able to download various apps from the Google PlayStore with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Took awhile, but its good
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Took about a week longer than they said and it practically was bare bones, no games or apps on it like the first one I ordered. But it wasn't a problem since I still had the history of my Google store from my other one. I simply downloaded the apps and its working fine. Power button does have the tendency to get depressed into the case sometimes though and is a pain to take apart and pull it out, but overall happy with the device.

Once it was Charged I tried to look  throw the programs , and how to get around all the wig jets and icons . I am not all the happy with it I found it to be a bit to slow , the camera 's picture was very grainy. I Think this would be best for some one that is real good with android systems . And some one that has real good eye sight. The price is grate. the size is grate for a child, and it seem;d to be made quit good .

Reviews.Title: after a week it would not turn on

Easy to use system, only took me about 2 minutes to figure it out without using the manual. I bought it for my three year old son and serves its purpose. Easy to use as well, thinking of getting 2 more for my kids.The price isnt bad but my boys are 4 and 6 and dont want to spend that much on it.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED AND EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "BiloxiGal"
Reviews.Content: I got this for limited use while traveling back and forth to work on public transportation. I use it as an ebook reader more than anything.  It's exactly what I wanted.  I tried the least expensive Kindle, and found I just couldn't live with no color on the screen. I can download my ebooks from Amazon using the wi-fi at home with no problems.  The wi-fi setup didn't take any time at all.  The cost of the tablet is such that if I lose it or it disappears while taking it back and forth, I won't feel too bad.  I can also check my email once I get to work on a nearby open wi-fi network if I want to.  I installed a 16 gig sd card on it with some music files yesterday, but haven't tried it yet.  However, the transfer was a breeze.  My computer recognized the tablet, and the tablet showed the USB symbol that let me use it as another drive.I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Did not work for me!
Reviews.Author: Jade

Reviews.Title: My daughter is extremely happy
Reviews.Author: AlisonJ75
Reviews.Content: This tablet was purchased by and for my 10 year old daughter with her own birthday money. It was delivered on time, however, the packaging was not secure, as the side of the box was simply folded in; no tape, no seal whatsoever. The touch screen is super sensitive, very difficult to scroll without selecting something unwanted.

Reviews.Title: very pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: South Sound Sailor
Reviews.Content: This tablet (the Zeepad 7.0) was a birthday gift for my 10 year old son. He is VERY rough with toys and anything that's electronic. I was hesitant to give him a tablet of any kind but he had shown great interest in using his mom's Kindle Fire (under her watchful eye!), including practicing reading skills, so I decided to go with a budget-priced tablet and get him one of his own. We are now at week 3 with his use of the Zeepad and so far, so good! He uses it daily for Netflix, Angry Birds and reading e-books. I estimate he's put at least 80 hours of use into the tablet and it still functions perfectly.I was VERY pleased with the quality of the video, given the price range. I was expecting Netflix movies to appear blocky and lo-res looking but that's not at all the case. I'm very pleased with the overall performance of this tablet. I've had no problems logging into Google Play and installing new apps. Keep in mind - this tablet is NOT going to set speed records. Yes, there are lag times in contrast to higher priced tablets but we're talking maybe 1 to possibly 5 seconds (Netflix in particular can take several seconds to boot up). But once an app is up and running, we've had no performance problems.One BIG caution. The battery life is very short before recharging is required. He usually just stays plugged in (you can charge and use the device at the same time) to avoid having the tablet shut down during a record-breaking Angry Birds game. I estimate the battery life is 2 to 2.5 hours tops.If you are able to cope with the short battery life, I highly recommend the Zeepad for kids and for anyone who is looking for a low-priced tablet.

Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival
Reviews.Author: Laura "Laura A."
Reviews.Content: I was excited to find an affordable tablet, I couldn't wait to use it.  It arrived quickly, and secure packaging etc.The product simply didn't work.  It didn't remotely have a charged battery when it arrived, so I tried to plug it in.  The pin alignment for the power source is very small, and the edging / border sort of hid the pin area. I did have to wiggle it around a little bit for it to make a connection.  I was hopeful when it displayed a green battery - but instantly it turned red, and powered off.I tried to connect with the micro usb to usb cord.  It did turn on momentarily with a logo, then immediately shut down.The bottom edge border of the tablet seemed raised, and when I pressed on it, it clicked into place.  Hoping this helped with the alignment, I tried to attach the power source again.The green battery light appeared only for an instant, when I moved it on to a table to charge.  This made the powersource lose a solid connection and again this red battery light appeared.I'm very disappointed.  I really was looking forward to having a simple to use tablet with just the basics.  Instead, I received a broken piece of equipment.  I will save my $ and buy something brand name.

Reviews.Title: I am amazed!
Reviews.Author: N. Bolser
Reviews.Content: It works! and works well.  I have almost no experience with tablets, really have no idea what I'd do with one, but for the price, I figured I'd find out what its good for.  Still working on that part, but this little device is way more than I'd expected.  I nearly sent it back, could not get it to connect up to my wireless at home.  Took it into a local shop and asked nicely if he could get it to connect.  There it was.  Went home, reset the router and the Zeepad immediately connected.  It was me, not the Zeepad.  Off to the Google Play Store...A month later.  I still very much like this little tablet.  Had a terrible time connecting it to the computer by USB, but finally figured out that an option to "debug the USB connection" was checked off.  Sounds like a good thing to do whatever it is, but it stopped the USB connection.  Unchecked it, and bang, it was connected.Haven't found any apps it would not run, mostly games.  Battery life isn't great, but it uses the same micro USB as the cell phones we have, so finding a charger and cable is no problem around the house.  Added a 16 GB memory chip, so the Zeepad is loaded with videos, talking books, epub books, and handles all well.  It did not like the high resolution videos, so ran those through Format Factory to knock down the resolution and shrink the size.  Very watchable.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad for the kids
Reviews.Author: Zeepad Parents
Reviews.Content: We got two Zeepads for our kids. We have a 5 year old boy and a 10 year old girl. Upon reading other reviews that these might be somewhat fragile, we have drilled into the kids that they need to be gentle with them. In general, these work just like a Droid smart phone and last a couple of hours before they need to be recharged. As we don't really want the kids playing games longer than this, we are fine with the batter life. The Google Play Store works just like on a smartphone and we have had no issues with this or using the wifi. I added a couple of leftover mini SD cards I had from old smart phones to increase the storage space for the kids.The only issues we have had with these tablets have all been in with either the original seller (not Goodios) or the quality control of the product. We originally ordered these 15 days before christmas to be from Santa. These never arrived, Amazon refunded our money and that company is no longer in business. Beware of the folks with the cheapest price. We then re-ordered these from Goodios who have been perfect in solving our problems. Our first set of these arrived and one of them was dead on arrival. It was quickly replaced with another that had a bad charger. We had a new charger within a couple of days and then found out the little USB connector was also defective. They sent us one of those and now everything works fine.We got the little USB keyboards that double as covers which work fine with one exception. When the Zeepad is in the case and the case is turned vertically the Zeepad can slip out of the little claws that hold it in. As these cases are all made the same I will put either double sided tape or some velcro on ours to keep this from happening.We really like these tablets and they kids have been using them up everyday when they get home from school for over a month. If Zeepad improved their quality control we would have had no issues with them at all. The 4 stars are because of this.  But for the price we really can't complain much about that either.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sharon Johnson
Reviews.Content: I was very upset when I ordered the Zeepad it was supose to come in before Christmas.  It DID NOT arrive untill after Christmas!!!!! It was my son's Christmas present.  If it was not going to be here before Christmas the company should have said it would not arrive in time for Christmas.  I placed the order on December 15, 2012.  On my order it said delivery estimate was December 18 - 21, 2012.  I would have paid extra to get it shipped by Christmas or ordered from somewhere else, but didn't know it would not arrive in time for CHristmas!!! When it did not arrive by December 21 I looked on line and it said it had been shipped.  The postal service told me it looked like they had just made the lable for shipping but it hasn't left company yet.  I tried to contact engine29 and could not. But when I was triying to contact them I saw where they had done the same thing to several other customers.  I emailed the company (because they didn't list a phone number - I wanted to talk to someone personally) and didn't get a responce.  By this time I was really afraid I would not receive the Zeepad, they had taken my money, but saw on Amazon where you prevented that form happening.  I would not recommend this company to anyone.  But as far the Zeepad it is ok for what we wanted.  My 11 year old son uses. it.

Reviews.Title: A Seriously Good Deal for a Surprising Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Shoof "trice di cinema"
Reviews.Content: My wife has a Google Nexus 7 tablet and the latter is my only frame of reference for functionality and quality.I purchased (3) Zeepads for my grandchildren and they arrived 12/22/12 instead of the scheduled 12/21.  All were about 85% charged.  Each Zeepad connected to my wi-fi home network in a matter of seconds.  Touch screen was responsive and a breeze to navigate.  I am pleasantly surprised with the overall build quality and remarkable functionality of the Zeepad.While not as fast as the Google Nexus 7, which has a hotter Arm Holdings designed processor, the Zeepad's speed is quite adequate.  I was drawn to the Zeepad since its processor is also an Arm design and the Android operating system is tough to beat.  Image or screen quality is inferior to the Nexus but decent.  The difference can be noticed when viewing the screen from an angle, but as long as the view of the Zeepad is straight on, the quality is good, not great.  To put the review in perspective, remember the Zeepad is well below $100 and, at this price point, I think this product is a real value.  Actually, it is a remarkable surprise.  My grandkids opened these on Xmas Eve and within seconds were connected to the net and gazing at more apps (mostly free games) on GooglePlay, where android apps are offered in abundance.  Did not experience any slowness as mentioned in some reviews.  Perhaps the network? Durability is an unknown since we have had the Zeepads for just few days so I'll follow up in a month or so.  While I was very skeptical that a tablet would do all the things claimed, after seeing the Zeepad in action, I wish I would have grabbed one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Frozen

Reviews.Content: The first week this item worked fine, but after one week it it began freezing up.  Sent back to company.

Reviews.Title: Received a USED Zeepad!!!!!
Reviews.Author: I am 4 YHWH r u
Reviews.Content: I ordered in in Dec., it arrived Jan. 17th.  The first sign that this was not going to go well was the way it was packaged...or the lack of packaging.  LOL.  The tablet comes in the box that you would find it in any retail store, then it had only one layer of bubble wrap covered by a layer of packing tape. What kind of a company packs like this???  (it is not packed into a shipping box).It only gets worse, the screen is extremely scratched, and raised above the frame on one side, and it had a half worn sticker on it.  The WIFI must be within 2 feet in order to connect...but the browser doesn't work anyway.  Also the unit will not charge at all if the tablet is turned on.Despite all this we were able to download a couple of games that did work well and were a ton of fun at first, that is until they started to freeze up.I contacted the company on the 18th, and they responded back saying the item is new and "show us a photo where is the scratches.thanks!".  So I replied back with pictures.Next they agreed it was scratched and offered to send me "the film" to repair it and a new charger.There is so much wrong with this Zeepad that a screen and a charger wouldn't come close to fixing it.  I replied back that I did not pay full price for a used, disfunctional tablet that I would have to fix.Their last response was just one short sentence..."pls ship back we refund you.thanks"Evidently they also want me to pay to ship this useless, previously returned item.  It is so disappointing.  Hopefully they aren't planning to ship it off to the next unsuspecting person.Hmmm, I guess when I get back home I will need to dig out the layer of bubble wrap they used to box it???  I just don't have time to deal with stuff like this...how disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Don't Purchase from this company!
Reviews.Author: TNB "TNB"
Reviews.Content: Tablet stop working the first day i received it. 4GB is a lie, more like 1GB. I don't know if buying the TF card will help the limited storage problem, but it pisses me off because i can't download movies for my kids! I haven't allowed it to charge the recommended initial six hours, but battery drains very quickly! The return policy is ridiculous, 20-50% restocking fee for items that aren't defective is highway robbery! This company(Engine29) has a problem not the tablets. I've heard nothing but good things about the Zeepads, so i can only assume that they knowingly sell damaged products. It's suspicious to me, my items arrived without warranty info, generic user manuel, and no information on the product or on the user manuel about the maker of the product. Amazon suggested i "Bing or Google"(no lie) the maker, they only had an email address for Engine29. I'm greatly disappointed that Amazon doesn't have more info on who they do business with.

Reviews.Title: Sent it back
Reviews.Author: Dancherd
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 11 yr old with restrictions on when she could use it providing homework is done, chores are done etc. With that stipulation, to protect her from being tempted, and because I am smart, I put a password on it. At first I used the slide lock. Well I forgot the combination but after 3 tries it asked if I wanted to open with my google account. Nice save! So still feeling pretty sure of myself I set a password and left for work. Returning home to find her chores done, homework done and room clean  she earned play time. I have to admit that after hours of trying every combination of what I thought the password was, I was never able to unlock it.I take full responsibility for forgetting the password. I give this tablet a low rating because there is NO reset button!! Before sending back I searched for hours on the internet looking for help on how to reset it. For the money it is not a bad product and my daughter enjoyed it for her first tablet. But what are the chances that she would set a password and forget later on without any way to reset it? With the slide lock after 3 tries it did give the option to override and we were able to get in. With the password however, I tried over 300 combinations and never got the option to open with my google account. I saw many other sites with the same complaint but never found an answer. Nor was I able to find the manufacturer info to call and ask if there was a way to reset the tablet. So I sent it back and will try another brand.

The charging connection is wonky enough to mention to anyone considering this purchase. The price is nice, and I am still optimistic that it will do what I need it to do, but be forewarned on the charger not fitting into the pad snugly. Reviews.Title: It's good for a kid - you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: JC in the DubC
Reviews.Content: Although the expedited shipping through the USPS was a few days behind schedule (better late than never) - I wont hold that against the manufacturer.The tablet itself is light-weight, easy to use, and meets my expectations for an Android OS. Although it took some tinkering in the settings, eventually I got it to unfreeze enough to download apps. (Instructions indicated doing something, but the print is so small and pictures even smaller that even with 20/20 vision I couldnt figure out what it said). The touch pad isn't always all that responsive...but for the most part, it's good enough for a 12 year old. I wasn't using the stylus that comes with it at the time..but perhaps the response from the touch screen would have been slightly better if it had.Ran into some issues of it 'not responding' and not accepting my request to shut the system off to try and fix the problem - eventually I did get it to come out of it's funk and it worked just fine. But it does freeze a bit. Runs a little slow, but with only 512MB of Ram, I chalk that up to the fact it's been a while since I've worked with something with such a slow processing speed.It's a decent reader - the kid prefers the weight and size compared to that massive Nook she got from another relative for Christmas. The fact that it is PINK is possibly the biggest plus. It does run most Google Play apps - so that is a plus since they are mostly free.  The front facing camera is pretty poor quality, so that feature for Skype is there, but know it's about as good as webcams from 10 years ago. If you're kids aren't very patient - might not be for them as it does seem to freeze if you're scrolling through the screens...but I like it over all and would even buy myself one for the reader alone.

Reviews.Author: Marina
Reviews.Content: My mom bought this tablet for my super spoiled little sister. And yeah, its a kid tablet. I thought it would be more durable.But my seven year old sister dropped it. And the screen cracked. Only a white screen. It went blank. So I recommend anyone buying this to invest in a case. And now she wants to take my laptop and possibly destroy it.She's a destroyer!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Yessenia
Reviews.Content: I have not recived it yet and its been over a month it going to be 2 months almost since I placed my order and have not recived it.

Reviews.Title: zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: crystal lee lopez
Reviews.Content: ORDERED THESE FOR MY CHILDREN.. ONE OF THEM THE CAMERA DIDNT WK..BUT THEY WERE KIND ENOUGH TO SEND ME ANOTHER ONE WHEN I SENT MINE BK.. FAST SERVICE AND ALWAYS RESPONDS TO UR EMAILS..I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS SELLER .. AND HOPE TO PURCHASE MORE PRODUCTS IN THE NEAR FUTURE..

Reviews.Title: This its good n its real!!..
Reviews.Author: JAIR
Reviews.Content: Me gusta kede satisfecho con la compra.. buen producto y no tuve ningun problema con el envio todo como lo explican es cierto ademas de muy buen precio... Like it...

Reviews.Title: Dont waste your money
Reviews.Author: Myroslava M.
Reviews.Content: Dont go for a cheap price, its a total waste of money. Tablet freezes non stop, even with facebook!!Youtube videos dont work, Netflix is slow, overall the tablet is useless.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: MINDY SILVESTRE
Reviews.Content: OFCOURSE FOR THE PRICE I PAID I WASNT EXPECTING AN IPAD. INTERNET VERY SLOW. LOOSES CONNECTION TO INTERNET ONCE GOING FROM ONE PAGE TO THE NEXT. MY CELLPHONES INTERNET IS FASTER, HAHA.... PAY MORE AND EXPECT BETTER QUALITY. LESSON LEARNED. I RATED THE TABLET STAND POORLY BUT ACTUALLY IS OF GOOD QUALITY AND HANDY. OOPS

Reviews.Title: Used item
Reviews.Author: Leonard O
Reviews.Content: Company sold me a used Zeepad. Scratches on front of unit. I will never purchased any product from this company again.

Reviews.Title: What a disappointment!
Reviews.Author: JWS
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my daughter for Christmas. What a disappointment! The tablet never turned on--nothing. It also did not receive a charge. I tested the charger that came with the tablet on another tablet I have and it worked fine. I unplugged it while it was still warm and plugged it into the Zeepad and it went cold. E-mails and telephone calls went unanswered. I returned it for my money back.

Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Ebony
Reviews.Content: Device didnt work well as far as touch screen and had to keep resetting it to get it to connect to wifi. Also the adapter plug in tht were sent with the device to charge did not fit in the device or the usb to plug into computer. The charger was very short. Wld not recommend. Bought for my 2 yr old and she doesnt even want to play w it!

Reviews.Title: don't have it
Reviews.Author: don't buy
Reviews.Content: don't have it need it would love it be for x-mas if you all can speed things nup would love it .Because my daughter will be pissed for real so help ok!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Dominique Mosley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my daughter and I thought that it would be a great item for her but it turned to be a rip off also!! Amazon is money and time wasting!!!

Reviews.Title: 4 gb
Reviews.Author: Susan P.
Reviews.Content: Gift for my grandson. I'm sure he'll love it. Yes, I know this review is not helpful... I'm just the grandma.

Reviews.Title: extremly poor quality. Not enough GB to connect to the internet. Be prepared to upgrade or spend money on another product.
Reviews.Author: Nichole Flores
Reviews.Content: Exremly poor quality. Not enough GB to connect to the internet. Be prepared to upgrade or spend money on another product.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed Customer
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: Huge issue with the google play store and the connection. Never been able to install my apps on that. Plus it is not 4GB like the description says but rather 1.70GB. I am disappointed. It is cheap made (the outer box) and a single drop of rain on the screen would make the display shake like it's got a virus. Battery dies quick  when videos are played. The book reader can hurt your eyes, the resolution is not the best. The only good side is the audio music part and folders and pictures.
